  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1230</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1230</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¿Cómo se escogen las noticias?</string>
            <string language="en">How do they choose the news?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie wählen sie die Nachrichten?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment choisissent-elles les nouvelles ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como escolhem a notícia?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come scelgono le notizie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς επιλέγουν τις ειδήσεις;</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta que informa l'alumnat dels criteris que s'utilitzen al món del periodisme per escollir les notícies més importants. S'ofereix un llistat de criteris i una adreça de pàgina web per ampliar dades del tema.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) explaining how journalists choose the most important items of news. It includes a list of criteria and a link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fonts d'informació</string>
            <string language="en">information source</string>
            <string language="es">fuentes de información</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mitjans de comunicació de masses</string>
            <string language="en">mass media</string>
            <string language="es">medios de comunicación de masas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">premsa</string>
            <string language="en">press</string>
            <string language="es">prensa</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und beantworten Sie (das DURCHSCHNITTLICHE) 
Erklären, wie Journalisten die wichtigsten Einzelteile von 
Nachrichten wählen. Es schließt eine Liste von Kriterien und 
ein Link für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remettez en cause et répondez à expliquer (PAR) comment 
les journalistes choisissent les éléments les plus importants des 
nouvelles. Elles incluent une liste de critères et un lien 
pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda a explicar (PAR) como os journalists 
escolhem os artigos os mais importantes das notícias. Inclui 
uma lista dos critérios e uma ligação para uma informação mais 
adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a spiegare (PAR) come i giornalisti 
scelgono gli articoli più importanti delle notizie. Includono 
una lista dei test di verifica e un collegamento per ulteriori 
informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν πώς οι 
δημοσιογράφοι επιλέγουν τα σημαντικότερα αντικείμενα των 
ειδήσεων. Περιλαμβάνει έναν κατάλογο κριτηρίων και μιας 
σύνδεσης για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationsquelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Massenmedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Presse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émetteur d'informations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mass media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">presse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fonte de informação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">media maciços</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imprensa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sorgente di informazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mass-media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pressa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πηγή πληροφοριών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαζικής επικοινωνίας μέσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύπος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
